creator: Plato (Πλάτων)
description:
LibriVox recording of Laches by Plato (Πλάτων). (Translated by Benjamin Jowett.)
Read in English by Geoffrey Edwards
Laches (Λάχης) discusses examples of courage including weapons masters, soldiers who stand firm in battle, ferocious animals and the wise person who endures evils. (Summary by Geoffrey Edwards)
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;philosophy; God; Greek; ethics; plato; virtue; courage; bravery
title: Laches
